content.content: Sorry for not getting this up on Friday, would like to blame something legitimate but the forum was acting slow and I said I’d come back to it… now it’s Monday and my guilt has compelled me to preface this update with this brief apology   Highlights  Another successful Meet Your Delegate call with @Hasu hosted by @prose11. Shoutout to @blimpa for the graphics, @LongForWisdom for the coordination, and @Patrick_J for owning the Recognized Delegate process.  @TheExistence cooking up an off-chain incentivization proposal for the community, currently being reviewing and refined by GovAlpha leadership.   Quarterly Focuses  Participation  As highlighted, we brought a new Recognized Delegate aboard last week.  @hernandoagf has been crushing a Governance Dashboard Prototype, linking to last weeks version so we don’t leak too much alpha    @LongForWisdom and @prose11 continue to work with DUX for framing on-chain incentivization.   Exploration   @Gala and @Sebix have been training under @blimpa for processing MIPs, while this might be more of an “other,” their work is crucial for maintaining a resilient and decentralized governance team.  @prose11 met with @layerzero and @astrogator to give feedback and explore a method for requesting legal review of new proposals.  @AstronautThis continued Maker Operational Manual work, much of which is being translated for the Spanish-speaking community by @Sebix.   Weekly Tasks  Executive Process - @Patrick_J + @LongForWisdom  Polls Process - @blimpa, @prose11 , @TheExistence, @Gala, @Sebix  Governance and Risk Meeting Chair - @prose11  GovAlpha Weekly Update - @prose11  Delegate Metric Tracking - @Patrick_J  MIPs update - @Gala, @blimpa  Office Hours - @LongForWisdom + @prose11
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Highlights  As alluded to last week, we have a new version of a Governance Voting Dashboard designed by @hernandoagf  Our newest contributor @tylermeanswell is already submitting PRs, what’s holding you back, anon?   Quarterly Goals  Participation   @LongForWisdom and @prose11 have been collaborating with DUX for some UI features on delegates coming soon    @Gala put out a call to facilitators to encourage MKR delegation for their contributors.  @prose11 submitted a tweet request to promote institutional delegation.  @Patrick_J is training @tylermeanswell on delegate metric tracking, so be on the lookout for a new name in your DMs @Recognized-Delegates    Exploration  More incentive exploration with @Patrick_J, @TheExistence and @LongForWisdom   @prose11 did some more collaboration with @layerzero on inserting a legal review question into Governance.  @blimpa and @Sebix are reviewing MIPs to prepare for our future goal of updating outdated/unclear MIPs with present operating procedures.   Other Updates   @LongForWisdom has been cleaning up forum tags, working with @hernandoagf to make better organization via a new Discourse Plug-in, hard launch coming soon     Weekly Tasks  Executive Process - No exec this week! Polls Process - No polls either   Governance and Risk Meeting Chair - @prose11  GovAlpha Weekly Update - @prose11  Delegate Metric Tracking - @Patrick_J + @tylermeanswell  MIPs update - @Sebix, @blimpa  Office Hours - @LongForWisdom + @prose11
welcome  @tylermeanswell      prose11:   Polls Process - No polls either      omg… cannot recall when was the last time we had no polls in the voting portal…
Granted still 9 Ratification polls ongoing  But same, gave me a lot of anxiety to not find anything ready to be polled. Hopefully is a nice break for the frequent voters.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
